title: ripristino messaggi
content: ho disinstallato Thunderbird con l'app center di ubuntu, perchè avevo problemi ad inviare la posta con un account. L'ho reinstallato con la medesma app. Nella posta tuttavia ho trovato i messaggi fino al 24/01/2024. Dal 24/01/2024 ad ieri non c'erano più. Anche le password erano aggioranate al 24/01/2024 suppongo che da qualche parte ci sia il profilo che stavo usando, con la posta e le password. Come posso ricaricarlo?
creator: ctomas61

title: Unable to dismiss auto-added Google Calendar event reminders in Thunderbird
content:
I cannot "dismiss" calendar events from Google Calendars where the event was auto-added based on data from contacts in Google Contacts. The events all show an "Organizer" of "unknownorganizer@calendar.google.com". I don't want to "work around" this by disabling reminders, as this defeats a LOT of the purpose of having the calendar in the first place, for me at least. I did find that I can delete the calendar entry if I access it via the a Web browser, so it's not like I don't have "write rights" to it. It's a mystery to me as to why it can't be otherwise updated. I also noted that these events have very bizarre "reminder" settings. They have a reminder set for 159 hours before the event starts, as well as the even more bizarre 9 hours after the event. There doesn't appear to be any related settings in Google Calendar on the Web that would have caused these wacky reminder configurations.

FYI - I'm not using any calendar extensions in Thunderbird.
creator: salindley0

title: Overstappen van Windows Live Mail naar Thunderbird
content: Dear, I have installed Thunderbird but transferring the data from Windows Live Mail does not work, because importexporttools-3.3. 2-sm+tb.xpi cannot be opened with any program because it ‘seems damaged’ (when opened with Firefox) or is not recognized (when opened with other programs) or importexporttools_ng-14.1. 10-tb.xpi is not verified (when opened with Firefox). Do you know another working program to transfer mails, contacts and calendar, or explain to me what I am doing wrong. I am a complete PC novice. Thanks in advance for your help. This is a Google translation. Suus

title: Inbox Emails gone completely after clicking on "Run filters on folder"
content: I clicked on Run Filters on Folder while in my Inbox and they ALL disappeared. After some time, I discovered that they went into the Trash bin. The inbox has all but quit receiving emails since June 23rd and it appears that they are automatically going into Trash. Now...I made the awful mistake while in Trash to click on Run Filters on Folders to see if I had accidentally diverted my inbox into the trash and to my utter disappointment they too vanished. Any help will be greatly appreciated, I have some older emails that are very important and would like very much to retrieve them all. Thank you very much!
creator: jami913
